title: Lemon Curd
notes: This is the only lemon curd recipe, all others pale in comparison.
steps: Whisk together juice, zest, 1/4 cup sugar, and eggs in a 2-quart heavy saucepan. Stir in butter and cook over moderately low heat, whisking frequently, until curd is thick enough to hold marks of whisk and first bubble appears on surface, about 6 minutes. Add more sugar along the way to taste (probably a couple tablespoons).
Transfer lemon curd to a bowl and chill, its surface covered with plastic wrap, until cold, at least 1 hour.
